name: gp-registrations-management-information
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/gp-registrations-management-information.yaml --generator-key v3.0 -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/gp-registrations-management-information.json

author: NHS Digital
